item.description: OpenAI released its buzzy AI video-generation tool, Sora.

item.title: TikTok says ban would cost U.S. small businesses, creators $1.3 billion in first month
item.description: TikTok says the economic harm from a law signed by President Joe Biden would grow if the Supreme Court does not overturn it.
